document.full_text: toyota motor corp  might face limited production through july due to japan's march 11 earthquake and its aftermath, its u.s. sales chief, bob carter, said in a note to dealers.
document.title: toyota production might be limited through july
lines_and_colors: toyota motor corp  might face limited production through july due to japan's march 11 earthquake and its aftermath, its u.s. sales chief, bob carter, said in a note to dealers.
